targets.expr: sum by (table_name) (rate(legacy_expr_projection{table_name=~"$table_name"}[$__rate_interval])) / (sum by (table_name) (rate(req_get_one{table_name=~"$table_name"}[$__rate_interval])) + sum by (table_name) (rate(req_query{table_name=~"$table_name"}[$__rate_interval])) + sum by (table_name) (rate(req_scan{table_name=~"$table_name"}[$__rate_interval]))) * 100

sum by (table_name) (rate(legacy_expr_cond{table_name=~"$table_name"}[$__rate_interval])) / (sum by (table_name) (rate(req_put{table_name=~"$table_name"}[$__rate_interval])) + sum by (table_name) (rate(req_update{table_name=~"$table_name"}[$__rate_interval])) + sum by (table_name) (rate(req_delete{table_name=~"$table_name"}[$__rate_interval]))) * 100
